doc:
James Whitmore https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Whitmore 0 James Allen Whitmore Jr. (October 1, 1921 – February 6, 2009) was an American film, theatre, and television actor. During his career, Whitmore won three of the four EGOT honors: a Tony, a Grammy, and an Emmy. Whitmore also won a Golden Globe and was nominated for two Academy Awards. James_Allen_Whitmore_Jr. ( October_1_,_1921 – February_6_,_2009 ) was an_American_film , theatre , and television_actor . During his_career , Whitmore won three of the_four_EGOT_honors : a_Tony , a_Grammy , and an_Emmy . Whitmore also won a_Golden_Globe and was_nominated for two_Academy_Awards .
